definition: Huangguoshu falls, Anshun 安順|安顺[An1 shun4], Guizhou
pinyin: Huang2 guo3 shu4 Da4 Pu4 bu4

definition: Huangguoshu waterfalls, Anshun 安順|安顺[An1 shun4], Guizhou

sentences.english: Here we arrived at end of a very scenic Tad Sae waterfalls.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，我們在一個非常優美塔德世瀑布年底抵達。

sentences.english: They knew that developing iteratively was better than using a waterfall process.
sentences.chinese: 他們知道迭代開發遠比使用瀑布過程要好。

sentences.english: After lunch , the group will visit macadamia nuts farm , rainbow falls and an orchid garden.
sentences.chinese: 下午參觀夏威夷農場蘭花園和彩虹瀑布。

sentences.english: The old road beside the waterfall place is Jianguo Ridge, leading to Jianguo Village at the hill above.
sentences.chinese: 瀑布羣旁就是建國嶺，通往山頂的建國村。

sentences.english: The obverse shows the Huangguoshu Waterfall in Guizhou province.
sentences.chinese: 正面以貴州省黃果樹瀑布作主題。

sentences.english: Wholeness and continuance are the characteristic divisors of landscape investigation in falls group.
sentences.chinese: 整體性和連續性是瀑布羣景觀調查的所特有的因子。

sentences.english: Customs house's building and electronic waterfall clock also is quite new DuiJing.
sentences.chinese: 海關大樓與電子瀑布鍾也是頗有新意的對景。

sentences.english: Metrics like these are difficult to collect in a traditional waterfall process.
sentences.chinese: 像這些量度在傳統的瀑布過程中是很難收集的。

sentences.english: Does this flight lie over at great fall on its way to New York City ?
sentences.chinese: 這班機去紐約途中要在大瀑布停留嗎？

sentences.english: He used to walk on a tightrope across the Niagara Falls.
sentences.chinese: 他常走鋼絲來跨越尼亞拉加瀑布。

sentences.english: Down the side of the mountain tumbled a foaming waterfall.
sentences.chinese: 在山的一側還有瀑布翻騰而下，撞擊出白色的水沫。

sentences.english: Sunlit waterfall spray tumbles into our boat and a chorus of various insects rings in our ears.
sentences.chinese: 陽光下的瀑布水花灑落進小船，蟲鳴聲不絕於耳。

sentences.english: Many salmons are leaping up the falls.
He passed by a waterfall. Many people who wore waterproof raincoat were taking pictures of the waterfall.
sentences.chinese: 很多穿着防水雨衣的人正在那裏怕瀑布的照片。

sentences.english: About halfway through your hike, you'll come across a picturesque waterfall.
sentences.chinese: 行至中途，你會不期遇到一個風景如畫的瀑布。
